hold_date.description: The date the hold was placed

pickup_library_id.description: Internal library identifier for the pickup library

cancelation_date.description: The date the hold was cancelled

priority.description: Where in the queue the patron sits

status.description: A one letter code defining what the status of the hold is after it has been confirmed

timestamp.description: Timestamp for the latest hold update

waiting_date.description: The date the item was marked as waiting for the patron at the library

lowest_priority.description: Controls if the hold is given the lowest priority on the queue

suspended.description: Controls if the hold is suspended

suspended_until.description: Date until which the hold has been suspended

item_type.description: If record level hold, the optional itemtype of the item the patron is requesting
